definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: The robberies have chilled the mah-jongg network.
sentences.chinese: 搶劫案已經使麻將賭博網絡膽戰心驚。

sentences.english: To play Mah-jong well depends on both your skill and luck.
sentences.chinese: 要玩好麻將不僅要靠技術還要靠運氣。

sentences.english: acquaintances often gather to play for fun, with no wagering.
sentences.chinese: 熟人經常聚在一起打麻將玩，不下注。

sentences.english: These cards like head and playing on the tiles today.
sentences.chinese: 這些牌目及玩法就很像今天的麻將牌了。

sentences.english: The only thing is, if you want to join the janso club, you'll have to learn how to play mahjong.
sentences.chinese: 你想加入麻將會所，你唯一要做的學會搓麻將。

sentences.english: The only thing is, if you want to join the janso club, you'll have to learn how to play mahjong.
sentences.chinese: 你想加入麻將會所，你唯一要做的學會搓麻將。

sentences.english: Guest room style mahjong room is on F5 of main building, used for accommodation and entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 客房式麻將屋位於主樓5樓，集住宿娛樂於一體。

sentences.english: Yes. Probably the most popular is Mah-jong, a game played by four people.
sentences.chinese: 有，最風行的可能算麻將了，一種四個人玩的遊戲。

sentences.english: Mahjong rooms are also available for those who wants to pit their skills against each other.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，我們還擁有多個麻將室供遊客切磋技藝。

sentences.english: Although I am busy washing, he is playing Majiang with them.
sentences.chinese: 儘管我在忙着洗衣服，他卻在與他們一塊打麻將牌。

sentences.english: This kind of mahjong is composed of multilayer material bonding.
sentences.chinese: 這種麻將是由多層材料粘合而成的。

sentences.english: I am busy washing, but he is playing Majiang with them.
sentences.chinese: 我在忙着洗衣服，但他卻在跟他們打麻將牌。

sentences.english: Playing Mah-Jong is associated with prolonged immobility of the circulation of the lower limbs.
sentences.chinese: 玩麻將與下肢血液循環持久的靜止有關。

sentences.english: The object of the game is to make all of the tiles disappear without getting stuck.
sentences.chinese: 遊戲的目的讓所有麻將牌配對消失。

sentences.english: Chengdu mahjong sports may be any card to card, two, five cylinder twenty thousand.
sentences.chinese: 成都麻將競技可能是任何牌，聽牌爲兩張，五筒二萬。

sentences.english: In game nine, the bobbin bar mahjong two eight.
sentences.chinese: 合玩牌九，筒子槓麻將二八槓等。

definition: online game/abbr. for 網絡遊戲|网络游戏
Brothers!/brethren/dude (colloquial)/brother (diminutive form of address between males)
to play/to have fun/to hang out
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
variant of 伙計|伙计[huo3 ji5]
to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
